name: markpage-monorepo
description: Monorepo for markpage - markdown content management system

scripts.build: npm run build:pkgs && npm run build:website
scripts.build:pkgs: npm run copy-readme && npm run build --workspace=markpage && npm run build --workspace=@markpage/svelte
scripts.test: npm run build:pkgs && npm run test --workspace=@markpage/tests
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
